description: A sticky, smoky and slightly sweetened Japanese style dish.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Sweet Chicken Yakitori Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan on a medium heat, fry all of the sauce/marinade ingredients for 20 minutes until the sauce reduces by half.
Once the sauce has thickened, remove from the heat and separate into 2 bowls. 1 is for marinating the skewers and the other is for serving as a dip.
Add chicken pieces onto skewers. Heat up a chargrill to a medium heat. Drizzle chicken with canola oil before grilling. Grill the chicken skewers on the chargrill for 5 minutes while rotating.
Baste the chicken with the marinade while cooking and rotate. Repeat the basting process about 3 to 4 times until the chicken is cooked fully though.
Serve the skewers with the extra dipping sauce on the side and a choice of condiments and sliced chillies to garnish.
